modName: Rarity Shield My Little Pony Friendship is Magic
summary: Replaces the  Whiterun guard\'s shield with the Rarity shield.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the  Whiterun guard\'s shield with the Rarity shield.

UPDATE: I fixed a spelling error in the mod files. Download the new version I uploaded to the page, it should work now.

I have another mod that replaces five of the game\'s shields with villains from the show.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1823
author: Browen
